title: Quality call the world
body: Make cheaper international calls using real telephony (not internet/VoIP).

title: Save those (roaming) bytes
body: Internet is needed only to start a call. Then your real phone is being called back.

title: Choose your identity
body: Add your phone numbers; then select which one the person you call will see (as caller ID).

title: Wherever you go
body: Another desk, office, or SIM today? Add that number for now, but keep showing your own caller ID.

title: Simply for you
body: Making things easy for you is our goal. Please tell us what you think, and we'll improve.
